reviews.quote: The psychological depth in this story is absolutely masterful. I couldn't stop reading until 3am.
Paige has this incredible talent for making you empathize with characters even as they're trapped in impossible situations.
The slow build is *chef's kiss*. You don't even realize how far you've fallen until it's too lateâ€”just like the protagonist.
I've been reading transformation fiction for 20 years and this is some of the best character work I've encountered.
The way Paige writes the 'point of no return' moment is absolutely devastating. I had to take a break to process it.
